title: The iDOLM@STER: Cinderella Girls - Honjitsu no Idol-san
original_name: アイドルマスターシンデレラガールズ 本日のアイドルさん
sinopse: 4-koma manga based on the iDOLM@STER mobile game "Cinderella Girls". Each chapter is divided in two parts: Idol of the Day, and Dereraji of the day, a collaboration with the Cinderella Girls radio show, "Dereraji".
